name: scrim 1.5: cow edition
description:
In this game you will experience the story from the point of view of a cow from scrim 1. What does the world really look like? find out more by playing

Includes:

-defualt rpg maker music lol

-google images images

-like 10 minutes of gameplay

-a ghost

-in depth unused kek mechanics

-funny sound effects

ENJOY!!! scrim 2 will come out someday.... be prepared

note: this was made in a week for a failed discord jam...
